p.font: Don't forget to checkout on the last page when you finished the quiz.

problem.p: The following multiple choice questions will mark anything you put in as correct.

multiplechoiceresponse.label: You make two Fraction objects as described in class with one_tenth = Fraction(1, 10) and result = Fraction(0, 10). You do result += one_tenth 10 times. At the end, the line float(result) == 1 is:
You make a float result = 0.0. You do result += 1/10 10 times. At the end, the line result == 1 is:
